A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Incredible film that surpassed my expectations. If you go in thinking this is going to be what internet rumors and trailers have set up\, you will be sorely disappointed. Johnson made a bold move that added much needed depth and emotion to the saga. Those hating it are likely missing the point. I have seen every film since ESB in theaters\, and I can definitely say this immediately became my favorite.
